title: Signing up to find pairs, coaches etc.
body_html:
Implements a first version of #63

This pull request does:

  • Require signin for submitting an application
  • After signup redirect to users#edit and ask for completing their profile
  • On users#edit add a list of interests users can check (like "finding a pair", "finding a coach", etc)
  • Change users#index to only list their name, interests and location
  • Make users#index the new homepage
  • Add the ability to pass a redirect_to param to have the user redirected back to the current page
  • Simplify the application form markup

I have deployed this on staging: http://rgsoc-teams-staging.herokuapp.com. We'd probably want to delete existing users from the 2014 teams app (should we have any, yet).

I think this can already replace our spreadsheet from last year

body:
Implements a first version of #63 

This pull request does:
- Require signin for submitting an application
- After signup redirect to `users#edit` and ask for completing their profile
- On `users#edit` add a list of interests users can check (like "finding a pair", "finding a coach", etc)
- Change `users#index` to only list their name, interests and location
- Make `users#index` the new homepage
- Add the ability to pass a `redirect_to` param to have the user redirected back to the current page
- Simplify the application form markup

I have deployed this on staging: http://rgsoc-teams-staging.herokuapp.com. We'd probably want to delete existing users from the 2014 teams app (should we have any, yet).

I think this can already replace [our spreadsheet from last year](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AjmbYjwdIlFZdHdMcERKVWxaVkVNX1BYRnlPVkV1bFE&usp=sharing)
